title: PROJECT Yasuo Recall Animation on Classic

embed.description: Description=============== ======================================== Hello guys, welcome to my video! Hope you guys enjoy the video I put allot of effort in making these video's ======================================== Cheapest Games! :http://adf.ly/1V17mF ======================================== Please make sure to like, subscribe And comment what kind of video's I could make!

body:
Hello, this is a post about Yasuo recall animation.
I have no idea how i got this bug. the only thing i do know is that its not right, I do have PROJECT Yasuo on a different accout. but I do not know if that interfears. Thanks

replies.body:
Hey! 

Thanks for the report! That's... super weird. O_o I just loaded him up and it looks like the base recall is playing for classic Yasuo. Are you able to get a 100% repro rate on this?

What do you mean with ''Repro''? maybe this is stupid to ask xD
Could be just me aswell tho, I asked my friend to tell me what he saw and he said ''Classic'' one.

I Will try using the: Fix button, or what its called.
Ah, sorry! Are you able to reproduce it - as opposed to it just happening one time. :)

Thanks for telling, and yes i can reproduce the bugg, I have just tried it in a custom game and i do get the PROJECT: Yasuo recall animation on the classic skin.

Oh by the way i have got a other bugg on Yasuo but was never looked at, and its still there.
Here is a link to the other bug if you would like to look at it: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=OJYxutHb56k
Thanks for the additional context - taking another look with the team today!
Reproduction. If you can you reenact the bug

was there a project yasuo on the enemy team? or perhaps just a project skin in the game?

with how a lot of the recent voice over bugs were (like omega squad teemo's for example) this seams like a possible reason.
No i was the only Yasuo in the game. at that moment.
